titles.title: A bill for the relief of Cornel H. Petrassevich.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 2/17/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in recognition of his assistance to the American Military Mission in Bucharest, Romania.
